question: Which of the following influenced Mahadev Govind Ranade to establish Prarthana Samaj in Bombay?
explanation: M. G. Ranade worked for the emancipation of women. In 1861, he founded the Widow Marriage Association. Keshav Chandra Sen influenced Mahadev Govind Ranade to establish Prarthana Samaj in Bombay. In 1870, Ranade rendered help in the establishment of Sarvajanik Sabha at Poona.
